episodes.title: Global study to expose mandated shunning
episodes.description: Patrick Haek of the Open Minds Foundation tells us more about the Roehampton study into mandated shunning and how you can lend your support.

episodes.title: Where next with Norway?
episodes.description: We speak to Patrick Haeck of the Open Minds Foundation, the charity behind the Stop Mandated Shunning campaign. What did we learn from the Norway court case? What are the next steps in this case, and others like it? Why is an official research study needed moving forward? Patrick provides the answers, providing hope for victims of mandated shunning.

episodes.title: Why the Norway verdict is not a win for Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: Watch Tower has won their appeal in Norway. The court has decided that State funding and official recognition should not be denied Jehovah's Witnesses. Why did they make this decision? Is it really a "win" for Watch Tower? And what do we do now? All will be answered in our latest livestream.

episodes.title: We've got a new website
episodes.description:
Check out our new website where you can join in our campaign to stop mandated shunning. Tell your story, participate in our research study, or make a donation. Your support matters!

Why we need $300,000 - https://youtube.com/live/CDbobLLYdds

episodes.title: We really need your help!
episodes.description:
In the wake of the Norway trial, our movement is gaining traction. But we desperately need your help with our global campaign to stop mandated shunning. In this live stream, Daniel explains what you can do to support us.

Donate to our GoFundMe campaign at https://www.gofundme.com/f/stopmandatedshunning

episodes.title: Monica is back from Norway!
episodes.description:
Monica is back from Norway with the latest update on the Jehovah’s Witnesses court case appeal. 

Victims of mandated shunning testified against Watch Tower’s harsh disfellowshipping policies, while an ex-JW called in from a North Sea oil rig to support those who have suffered. In a shocking move, Watch Tower’s lawyers labelled the victims “hostile.” 

The case is looking bad for the JW organization, but some believe they plan to lose so they can escalate it to the European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) for an even bigger legal battle. Will this be the beginning of real accountability for Watch Tower’s shunning policy?

episodes.title: Norway v Jehovah's Witnesses (Day 6)
episodes.description: Monica gives us an update on the last day in court. Morale is high for the ex-Witnesses and Watch Tower isn't looking happy. Please head over to https://stopmandatedshunning.org and lend your support - Tell your story, Take the survey, Donate, or Share our content to help get the word out about our global campaign to stop mandated shunning in high-control groups like Jehovah's Witnesses.

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses came to see me!
Norway v Jehovah's Witnesses (Day 4)
episodes.description: Join us as Stop Mandated Shunning's Monica calls in LIVE from Norway with an update on how things are going in the Oslo courtroom. For captions please see https://youtu.be/FLIIY_bhkvo

episodes.title: Norway v Jehovah's Witnesses (Day 5)
episodes.description: Today has the turn of ex-JWs to give their side of the story. Monica and Eydis call in from Oslo with an update on today's court proceedings. For captions please see https://youtu.be/MmZvbssNnnY

episodes.title: Norway v Jehovah's Witnesses (Day 4)
episodes.description: Join us as Monica calls in from Oslo as Jehovah's Witnesses' appeal against the decision to remove their state funding and registration due to their cruel practice of mandated shunning.

episodes.title: Monica is off to Norway!
episodes.description: Daniel speaks to Monica as she prepares to head off to Norway in support of the victims of mandated shunning. Apologies for the background noise. This was a test run for what will be less-than-perfect conditions when we do the live stream from Oslo. Hopefully, we will be able to bring you the news as it unfolds in real time.

episodes.title: Introducing the new Stop Mandated Shunning YouTube show
episodes.description: Hey folks! We're kicking off a new show on YouTube. Join the Stop Mandated Shunning team as we campaign to set legal precedents against this violation of human rights. Visit https://stopmandatedshunning.org to tell your story, take the survey, or make a donation. Follow us on social media @SMShunning

episodes.title: Help me to bring an end to mandated shunning
episodes.description: Daniel Torridon of OnionUnlimited speaks to former Jehovah's Witness Monica Velin Rodriguez about why she left the religion of her birth, and why she feels mandated shunning is so harmful.

episodes.title: My "mandated shunning" billboard
episodes.description:
Monica Velin Rodriguez tells us how she put up a billboard in her home town to highlight the devastating effects of mandated shunning. 

https://stopmandatedshunning.org/billboard-gives-a-voice-to-the-voiceless

episodes.title: Mandated shunning in high-control groups
episodes.description: Daniel Torridon and Monica Velin Rodriguez discuss the subject of mandated shunning within high-control groups. Monica tells her story of leaving Jehovah's Witnesses and being shunned by her family and friends. We delve into the prevalence of mandated shunning within high-control religious groups including Jehovah’s Witnesses, Ultra-Orthodox Jews, Exclusive Brethren, Amish, Bahá'í Faith, and Scientologists, and consider the upcoming appeal case in Norway. Learn how Stop Mandated Shunning is working to end this cruel practice and what you can do to help.
